The web address of the video: YouTube, V: The web address of the video: YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion or MP4.

Percentage: portion of parent size. Pixe: Percentage: portion of parent size. Pixels: absolute amount of pixels.
Aspect ratio: ratio of width to height. Percentage of parent: portion of parent height. Percentage of width: portion of the width. Pixels: absolute amount of pixels.
16:9 (Widescreen, HD Video), 4:3 (Classi: 16:9 (Widescreen, HD Video), 4:3 (Classic TV, Standard monitor), 3:2 (Classic film), 21:9 (Cinemascope), 1:1 (Square, Social media)
